snippet: “Constit2tion,” a movie by committee conceived, written and shot in just over 24 hours, screened to a packed house early Sunday at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theater.
abstract: Constit2tion, feature film conceived, written and shot by committee in just over 24 hours, will likely go on record books as world's fastest-made feature; movie, production of comic group Whale Thief, exemplifies manic creativity and can-do attitude.
lead_paragraph: “Constit2tion,” a movie by committee conceived, written and shot in just over 24 hours, screened to a packed house early Sunday at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theater.

headline.seo: Movie Cram II at the Upright Citizens Brigade Theater
headline.main: And Now, a Movie Hours in the Making!
headline.print_headline: And Now, a Movie Hours in the Making!
